Hitchhikers' Guide to the Galaxy, The.tr: a humorous British radio programme written by Douglas Adams, which later became a book and a television programme. It is a science fiction story about an Englishman called Arthur Dent who gets on a spaceship just before the Earth is destroyed, and the adventures he has in space with the other characters on this spaceship.
